CustomField.description: 1. Formatted Report: Export the report as it appears in Salesforce, including the report header, groupings, and filter details. 2. Details Only: Export only the detail rows. Use this to do further calculations or for uploading to other systems.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: 1. Formatted Report: Export the report as it appears in Salesforce, including the report header, groupings, and filter details. 2. Details Only: Export only the detail rows. Use this to do further calculations or for uploading to other systems.
CustomField.label: Export View
